product.title: New Colletion of Shoe
product.desc: Step into sophistication with these black formal oxford-style shoes from Bata. Crafted from premium corrected grain leather, these shoes exude timeless elegance. The TPR sole provides durability and traction, while the lace-up closure ensures a secure fit. Whether you're attending a business meeting or a special occasion, these shoes make a polished statement of style and professionalism.
